access_group_name.name: access_group_name
access_group_name.description: Name of the IAM Access Group to create if var.create_policy is true

client_dns_server_ips.name: client_dns_server_ips
client_dns_server_ips.description: DNS server addresses that will be provided to VPN clients connected to this VPN server

client_idle_timeout.name: client_idle_timeout
client_idle_timeout.description: The seconds a VPN client can be idle before this VPN server will disconnect it. Default set to 30m (1800 secs). Specify 0 to prevent the server from disconnecting idle clients.

client_ip_pool.name: client_ip_pool
client_ip_pool.description: The VPN client IPv4 address pool, expressed in CIDR format. The request must not overlap with any existing address prefixes in the VPC or any of the following reserved address ranges: - 127.0.0.0/8 (IPv4 loopback addresses) - 161.26.0.0/16 (IBM services) - 166.8.0.0/14 (Cloud Service Endpoints) - 169.254.0.0/16 (IPv4 link-local addresses) - 224.0.0.0/4 (IPv4 multicast addresses). The prefix length of the client IP address pool's CIDR must be between /9 (8,388,608 addresses) and /22 (1024 addresses). A CIDR block that contains twice the number of IP addresses that are required to enable the maximum number of concurrent connections is recommended.

create_policy.name: create_policy
create_policy.description: Set to true to create a new access group (using the value of var.access_group_name) with a VPN Client role

create_s2s_auth_policy.name: create_s2s_auth_policy
create_s2s_auth_policy.description: Create IAM Service to Service Authorization to allow communication between all VPN Servers (scoped to the given resource group) and the given Secrets Manager instance. Currently not possible to scope the policy to the exact VPN server ID since the policy is needed before the instance exists as it uses the cert stored in secrets manager during the provisioning process.

enable_split_tunneling.name: enable_split_tunneling
enable_split_tunneling.description: Enables split tunnel mode for the Client to Site VPN server

resource_group_id.name: resource_group_id
resource_group_id.description: ID of the resource group to use when creating the VPN server

secrets_manager_id.name: secrets_manager_id
secrets_manager_id.description: ID of the Secrets Manager that contains the certificate to use for the VPN, only required when create_s2s_auth_policy is true.

server_cert_crn.name: server_cert_crn
server_cert_crn.description: CRN of a secret in Secrets Manager that contains the certificate to use for the VPN

subnet_ids.name: subnet_ids
subnet_ids.description: List of subnet IDs to provision this VPN server in. List must have at least 1 subnet ID for standalone VPN and at least 2 subnet IDs for the High Availability mode.

vpn_client_access_group_users.name: vpn_client_access_group_users
vpn_client_access_group_users.description: List of users to optionally add to the Client to Site VPN Access Group if var.create_policy is true

vpn_gateway_name.name: vpn_gateway_name
vpn_gateway_name.description: The user-defined name for the VPN server. If unspecified, the name will be a hyphenated list of randomly-selected words. Names must be unique within the VPC the VPN server is serving.

vpn_server_routes.name: vpn_server_routes
vpn_server_routes.description: Map of server routes to be added to created VPN server.

vpn_server_certificate_secret_crn.name: server_cert_crn
vpn_server_certificate_secret_crn.description: CRN of a secret in Secrets Manager that contains the certificate to use for the VPN
